name: Augmented Browsing
body:
### Augmented Browsing
With augmented browsing, you can enhance your browsing experience. 

In order to get our browser extensions, please fork our git repository:

```
$ git clone git@github.com:zipcodeman/Augmented-Browsing.git
```

And install the userscripts on your browser.

### Current Features
Dictionary: Simply select a word, and our system will look up that word for you!
tagline: Extensions to enhance the browsing experience
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
